short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watches subreddits for new posts, and notifies you when a new post is created.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit Watcher is a simple extension that helps you stay on top of the "new", "rising" or "front page" sections of your favorite subreddits. You will receive a Chrome notification when a new post is found on the subreddits that you wish to track.
